title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Probabilities and laws of large numbers, General introduction; Quantum operations, Quantum error correction, Classical information and Shannon entropy, Linear algebra and axioms of quantum mechanics, Qubits, Quantum states: (Mixed states, Multiple systems and entanglement), Qubit operations, Quantum algorithm, Quantum cryptography, Quantum dynamics and measurements, Quantum circuit model, Quantum circuit model, Cloning and distinguishability, Quantum entropy, Bipartite pure-state entanglement, Mixed-state entanglement and entanglement monotones.Prerequisites: Classical Mechanics I, Quantum Mechanics I and II, Mathematical methods II.
